content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Stone Furnace at position (52.0, -84.0)
Consists of a furnace at position (52.0, -84.0) with 50 units of coal as fuel.

### Stone Furnace at position (52.0, -82.0)
Consists of a furnace at position (52.0, -82.0) with 46 units of coal as fuel and 36 iron plates as output.

### Stone Furnace at position (52.0, -80.0)
Consists of a furnace at position (52.0, -80.0) with 46 units of coal as fuel and 38 copper plates as output.

### Lab at position (unknown)
Consists of a lab with 30 automation science packs as input and researching automation, but it is not connected to the power network.

### Steam Engine at position (5.5, 0.5)
Consists of a steam engine at position (5.5, 0.5) with no input liquid and not connected to the power network, but it is connected to a small electric pole and a pipe.

### Offshore Pump at position (-7.5, 25.5)
Consists of an offshore pump at position (-7.5, 25.5) pumping water into a pipe group.

### Pipe Group
Consists of a group of pipes connecting the offshore pump to the steam engine, including pipes at positions (5.5, 3.5), (5.5, 5.5), (5.5, 4.5), and others.

### Electricity Group
Consists of an electricity group with id 107, including a small electric pole at position (3.5, 0.5) with 0 voltage.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing entities too far away
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to place an entity before placing it.

### Errors when placing entities without required items in inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to place an entity.

### Errors when crafting items with missing sub-ingredients
- Ensure you have all the required sub-ingredients before attempting to craft an item.

### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Ensure the entity can accept the item and has available space before attempting to insert it.

### Errors when using incorrect entity types
- Ensure you are using the correct entity type when attempting to insert items or access entity properties.

### Errors when accessing entity neighbors
- Ensure you are accessing the correct neighbor of an entity and that it is an Entity or EntityGroup.

### Errors when researching without power
- Ensure the lab is connected to the power network before attempting to research.
